other.title: Looker Studio Enterprise Dashboards
other.description: Business intelligence dashboards with advanced SQL, ETL pipelines, and real-time visualization for executive reporting.
highlights: Complex SQL queries with window functions and CTEs
Automated ETL pipelines across multiple data sources
Interactive dashboards with drill-down capabilities
Real-time KPI monitoring for executives
Custom calculated fields and advanced aggregations

other.title: Texas Hold'em Hand Analyzer
other.description: Interactive poker hand analyzer calculating winning probabilities for Texas Hold'em using Monte Carlo simulation.
highlights: Random card dealing algorithm
Monte Carlo simulation for win probability calculation
Real-time hand strength evaluation
Interactive UI for card selection and testing
Statistical analysis of starting hands

other.title: ASCII Golf
other.description: Web-based golf analytics and simulation tool featuring ASCII art layouts of major PGA Tour courses with real player statistics and Monte Carlo-style simulations.
highlights: ASCII art layouts of major PGA Tour courses with interactive visualization
Real PGA Tour player statistics and performance modeling
Monte Carlo simulation engine with configurable parameters
Weather conditions and player variability settings
Comprehensive results analysis with CSV export capabilities

other.title: SaaS Business Model Maker
other.description: Web-based financial modeling tool for SaaS businesses featuring month-by-month P&L simulation, cap table management, and Option Pricing Method (OPM) valuations.
highlights: Month-by-month P&L simulation with SaaS metrics (MRR, ARR, churn, CAC, LTV)
Advanced cap table management with multiple preferred classes
Option Pricing Method (OPM) for post-money valuation allocation
Interactive charts and downloadable CSV/Excel export
Scenario analysis with save/load and shareable URL capabilities
